messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: So somebody said earlier that tulius is a changling, a medal of valour will be awarded to anybody can catch him and prove he is a ling

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: New rule on fun time drugs, you can make em, but if you distribute them at all you can and will be arrested (see me for chem access)

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: So, a janitor is in very high demand, if anybody want to switch jobs, you may be awarded with a medal of distinguished conduct (for the sacrifice of your old probably preffered job)

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The bartender has just been awarded a medal of valour for saving my ass while robusting a ling, i still have a shit ton of medals if anybody else wants to do something exceptional

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: The captain, here, the singuloarity kinda cmae loose and unwrenched the whole engine, it seems to of dispursed now but engie is till a little bit fucked

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Shuttle Y/N? It has come to my attention things are starting to go a little bit south

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: So it turns out that singularity i mentioned earlier is still very much alive and guarenteed to be stage 5, whether or not it is near the station i have no clue, but shall we risk carrying on teh shift?

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Also, comms is down, come to HoP lien to discuss the matter

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Sorry but i will no longer be democratic in the shuttle, things are kind of fallign into anarchy, the lose singularity is still out there somehwere, comms is down and engie is fucked, also, i'm tired of chagelings just just get the fuck out of here

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Before we board the shuttle, time for a recap of this shifts best crewmates, the warden earned a medal of distinguished conduct for assisting with the changelings, het HoS earned a medal of valour for dieing while defendign his crew and the barkeeper earned a medal of valour for saving me while killing a ling, this my final annoncement and i will be staying on the station, a captain gotta go down with his ship yanno?

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Good bye crew, all the best in your future endeavours

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Library Lounge.
